title: sound cuts out on videos
content:
Sound stops in the middle of watching videos on youtube, amazon prime, facebook, etc. Sometimes pausing the video, switching to another tab and switching back will solve the problem for a couple seconds, then the sound will cut out again. I've tried: clearing updating the browser, clearing cookies & cache, uninstalling extensions, reinstalling the entire freaking browser. It's driving me bonkers.

Running verson 121.0 on windows 10.
creator: finch.trash

title: When I click the address bar, Firefox lists favorite sites.  How do I disable this list until after I've typed?
content:
When I click the address bar, Firefox lists favorite sites. How do I disable this list until after I've typed?

I don't want the list because I don't want to be distracted by these sites.

While they are safe-for-work, I'd rather "fun" sites didn't come up when I'm working with other people.
creator: firefox549

title: Unable to print from Toshiba Satellite w/windows 7 to HP Officejet 5255
content: As of 1/1/24 I cannot print using Firefox and USB connection to HP 5255. I can send and print a print quality diagnostic from my HP but not a file.
creator: S.P.CHENEY

title: Can't recover all of my bookmarks.
content: Hello, Firefox updated and my bookmarks are nowhere to be found. I turned on the show bookmarks and there is nothing there. I had so many and really rely on the easy access. There is no older version on my laptop. Are they gone forever. I really love firefox but am disappointed that this happened. Please let me know if there is anything I can do to retrieve my bookmarks. Thank you
creator: punkyd33

title: Bottom of Page
content:
Recently, one website (SF Chronicle) started automatically scrolling to the bottom of the page when I access an article. Occurs on no other sites nor on my other devices - only an my Dell desktop running windows 11 and the most recent version of Firefox.

When I follow a link to read an article I briefly see the heading but then it immediately scrolls down to the bottom of the page and I have to manually scroll back to the top of the page to read the article.
creator: sschoech

title: Problem accessing 'Keeper'
content: I have been having problems trying to access the website 'keepersecurity.com'. This started happening with Version 121. I contacted 'Keeper' about the issue, but nothing they suggested worked. While I am using Firefox as my browser, I also have Microsoft Edge installed and available to use. I accessed the site using Edge without any problems. So I assume the problem is with version 121.

title: twitter video not playing under bluetooth speaker
content:
hi

I am having a problem playing twitter videos when I use bluetooth speaker. it doesn't run properly.

when I switch to the laptops default realtek speaker driver, twitter video works fine.

i tried deleting twitter cookies. that did not work.
